description: The Douglas B-26C Invader is a propeller-driven attack aircraft. This variant has a glazed nose, wing guns, and only the dorsal turret. In place of the ventral turret, it has an extra fuel tank. Prior to 1948, it was designated A-26C.
variantnotes: Bomb system is ballistic (-1) if doing level bombing from four or more altitude levels above the target.
